医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
先进的胰岛素泵技术改善马拉松运动员的糖尿病管理将于今年在马德里举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（9 月 9 日至 13 日）上提交的一系列病例报告描述了根据胰岛素泵算法提供胰岛素剂量的技术如何帮助三名成年人1 型糖尿病患者可以更好地管理血糖，使他们能够过上更积极的生活，甚至可以跑马拉松。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Advanced-insulin-pump-technology-improves-diabetes-management-for-marathon-runners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Advanced-insulin-pump-technology-improves-diabetes-management-for-marathon-runners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43c5d02e-00c3-49a3-b709-d8044ba30354 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 14:09:39 -0400 Advanced insulin pump technology improves diabetes management for marathon runners
新的血液测试诊断 ALS 的准确率达到 98%肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 是一种影响大脑和脊髓神经元的进行性神经退行性疾病，现已开发出一种高度准确的血液诊断测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/New-blood-test-achieves-9825-accuracy-in-diagnosing-ALS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/New-blood-test-achieves-9825-accuracy-in-diagnosing-ALS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f6c96dc-5a21-4490-8ed1-fef85cc24600 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 13:58:39 -0400 New blood test achieves 98% accuracy in diagnosing ALS
试验发现在 tivozanib 中添加 nivolumab 对于晚期肾癌没有益处在丹娜—法伯癌症研究所领导的一项国际多中心随机 3 期临床试验中，研究人员测试了在 tivozanib 治疗中添加免疫检查点抑制剂 (ICI) nivolumab 对晚期透明细胞肾细胞癌（肾癌的一种形式）患者的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Trial-finds-no-benefit-of-adding-nivolumab-to-tivozanib-for-advanced-kidney-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Trial-finds-no-benefit-of-adding-nivolumab-to-tivozanib-for-advanced-kidney-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef5cdb40-5231-4ab2-9e66-6b25099ad620 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 13:48:06 -0400 Trial finds no benefit of adding nivolumab to tivozanib for advanced kidney cancer
新机制旨在确保公平分配麻疹疫苗和治疗方法世界卫生组织（WHO）和合作伙伴与会员国协调，建立了包括疫苗、治疗和诊断测试在内的MPOX医疗对策的获取和分配机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/New-mechanism-aims-to-ensure-equitable-distribution-of-mpox-vaccines-and-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/New-mechanism-aims-to-ensure-equitable-distribution-of-mpox-vaccines-and-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=462422df-cc3f-4e49-9206-4d997413db22 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 13:37:57 -0400 New mechanism aims to ensure equitable distribution of mpox vaccines and treatments
住宅附近的森林对于减轻与高温相关的健康风险至关重要在全球范围内，热浪变得更加频繁和强烈。因此，如何有效对抗高温的不利影响是一个日益重要的研究课题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Forests-near-homes-are-crucial-in-mitigating-heat-lated-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Forests-near-homes-are-crucial-in-mitigating-heat-lated-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b87533fe-b490-4622-bc0f-3066dfc3d355 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 13:32:42 -0400
世卫组织将 MVA-BN 疫苗列入资格预审清单，作为首个针对 MPOX 的疫苗世界卫生组织 (WHO) 宣布 MVA-BN 疫苗成为首个列入其资格预审清单的 MPOX 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/WHO-adds-MVA-BN-vaccine-to-prequalification-list-as-first-vaccine-against-mpox.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/WHO-adds-MVA-BN-vaccine-to-prequalification-list-as-first-vaccine-against-mpox.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d7266b7-9367-4899-9b39-29d3d13c0cd6 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 13:09:56 -0400 WHO adds MVA-BN vaccine to prequalification list as first vaccine against mpox
ISM2196：一种有前途的人工智能开发的 WRN 抑制剂，用于治疗晚期转移性癌症Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能（AI）驱动的生物技术公司，今天宣布提名 ISM2196，这是一种人工智能驱动的、潜在的同类最佳小分子 WRN 抑制剂，针对先进的转移性微卫星不稳定性（MSI）由综合致死策略指导的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/ISM2196-A-promising-AI-development-WRN-inhibitor-for-advanced-metastatic-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/ISM2196-A-promising-AI-development-WRN-inhibitor-for-advanced-metastatic-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7f09a9e-eb99-4250-b840-5630011cc5b2 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 12:35:11 -0400 ISM2196: A promising AI-developed WRN inhibitor for advanced metastatic cancers
CD47/SIRPα“别吃我”通路癌症治疗的进展2024 年 7 月 10 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷最近发表了一篇新社论，题为“靶向 CD47/SIRPα“别吃我”轴的进展及其作为抗癌疗法所面临的持续挑战。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Advances-in-targeting-the-CD47SIRPceb1-do-not-eat-me-pathway-for-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Advances-in-targeting-the-CD47SIRPceb1-do-not-eat-me-pathway-for-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e8b18ab-00ec-4e27-bbc7-646f70834bb4 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 12:31:42 -0400 Advances in targeting the CD47/SIRPα "do not eat me" pathway for cancer therapy
研究发现人类和狗在社交互动中大脑同步在社交互动过程中，大脑神经元的活动在所涉及的个体之间变得同步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Study-finds-brain-synchronization- Between- humans-and-dogs-during-social-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Study-finds-brain-synchronization- Between- humans-and-dogs-during-social-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04b3e75a-9a34-4fc7-a07e-06027d70e5b3 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 12:27:08 -0400 Study finds brain synchronization between humans and dogs during social interactions
肥胖药物利拉鲁肽对 6 岁至 12 岁以下儿童安全有效利拉鲁肽治疗可显着降低 6 至 12 岁以下肥胖儿童的 BMI，但胃肠道副作用提示需要进行更多研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Obesity-medication-liraglutide-is-safe-and- effective-in-children-ages-6-to-3c12-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Obesity-medication-liraglutide-is-safe-and- effective-in-children-ged-6-to-3c12-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c126ce74-b658-4c97-9a9f-eb5c2c9453ea Fri, 13 Sep 2024 09:03:00 -0400 Obesity medication liraglutide is safe and effective in children aged 6 to <12 years
